module.name: colissimo_simplicite
module.description: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe
module.author: Quadra Informatique
module.description_full: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe. 48h delivery service to home addresses or collection points.
module.additional_description: A free solution with no need for development, easy to install from your Prestashop back-office.An "iframe" delivery page that is consistent with the site, thus ensuring continuity in the buying process.A wide range of shipping methods to meet the needs of your e-buyers.Increased revenue through the Colissimo service in EuropeAccess to a dedicated customer area in the "Colissimo Box" and a tracking tool for your shipments: ColiView.A mobile version of the module to ensure compatibility and consistent sales throughout the day. This module will help you generate additional sales thanks to your multichannel presence.NB: This module is for traders with a SIRET French business identification number.

module.name: hipay_professional
module.description: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system. You can access all international and local payment solutions (Visa, MasterCard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationConnect with 30+ million Skrill account holdersHighest security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktop

module.name: fianetsceau
module.displayName: Avis FIA-NET – Le Sceau de Confiance FIA-NET
module.description: With the FIA-NET Sceau de Confiance, turn your visitors into buyers! Be transparent to users by highlighting the quality of your service. The principle is simple: your customers evaluate you
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With the FIA-NET Sceau de Confiance, turn your visitors into buyers! Be transparent to users by highlighting the quality of your service. The principle is simple: your customers evaluate you. Over 15 million reviews collected already! *
module.additional_description: Your shop is version 1.5 or 1.6? This module is already pre-installed and ready for use! To activate it, go to the "Modules" tab in your back office and click Install. This module is available for France.

module.name: shoppingfluxexport
module.description: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines.
module.additional_description: Sell your products List on Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping, Bing Ads, 11 Main, Rakuten, eBay Commerce Network, shopping.com, Shopzilla, PriceGrabber, and more than 1000 other sales channels internationally. Enhance Your Data Our DataFix Toolbox easily patches holes in your product data that would otherwise prevent you from listing and selling your products on a sales channel. Never Pay for Setup Shopping Feed's Automated setup gets you up and running on your favorite sales channels in a flash. Our dedicated support team will make sure you get connected, no matter how complicated the setup.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer. Google and PrestaShop increase your advertising investment by offering £75 after the first spent £25  (or 75€ for 25€ if you are not based in the UK) !  Download the module to get your promotional code and start your campaign now !
module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google AdWords, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers. To help you get started, we've partnered with Google to give you £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign.  Receive £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign. Or call 08001690713

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS
module.author: SendinBlue
module.description_full: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS. Synchronize your Prestashop subscribers with SendinBlue, easily create beautiful email campaigns and efficiently communicate with your prospects and clients.
module.additional_description: With SendinBlue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersOptimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: payplug
module.description: With PayPlug, online payment has never been so easy. Our online payment solution can be used with or without a merchant account and can be installed with just a few clicks
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With PayPlug, online payment has never been so easy. Our online payment solution can be used with or without a merchant account and can be installed with just a few clicks.
module.additional_description: Our modern and intuitive solution allows you to improve your conversion rate with our functions and ergonomics specifically designed for e-commerce. Thanks to PayPlug, you can simplify your online payments and no longer lose out on sales:Quick payment without registrationModern and sleek designAutomatic detection of card type

module.name: simplifycommerce
module.description: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution that helps businesses sell more by enabling their customers to pay how they want to pay
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution that helps businesses sell more by enabling their customers to pay how they want to pay.It is a uniquely versatile, highly secure and incredibly simple cloud-based payments platform.
module.additional_description: Built by MasterCard, a global leader in the payment industry, our merchants benefit from: ·         Omni-channel payment solution for website, mobile and eCommerce store·         Extensive versatile features including einvoicing, virtual terminal and social commerce·         Accepting major card brands·         Highest Level 1 PCI certification

module.name: rees46
module.description: A full suite of interconnected tools to turn visitors into customers, recover abandoned carts, reactivate and retain customers, and gain full control over online store growth
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A full suite of interconnected tools to turn visitors into customers, recover abandoned carts, reactivate and retain customers, and gain full control over online store growth.
module.additional_description: Set up REES46 once and manage all the necessary instruments with just one click.Increase revenue and customer engage.Reduce abandoned carts, reactivate 'sleeping' customers with personal offers.Analyse how things going on.

module.name: nostotagging
module.displayName: Nosto - The Complete Personalization Solution for PrestaShop
module.description: Nosto harnesses big data to build a deep understanding of every customer in real-time, automatically predicting and delivering the most relevant shopping experiences wherever your customers are
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nosto harnesses big data to build a deep understanding of every customer in real-time, automatically predicting and delivering the most relevant shopping experiences wherever your customers are.
module.additional_description: Increase customer lifetime value, average order value and conversion by personalizing the whole funnel:Acquire - Drive qualified traffic to your storeConvert - Encourage hesitant shoppers to continue to the checkoutRetain - Produce loyal customers and inspire return visits to your storeOptimize - Have full control to continually improve performance ...all the personalization tools you need in one solution. Pay only a small % of the revenue Nosto helps you generate!

module.name: easymarketing
module.description: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yours
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yourself - Sign-up for a free, 2 months trial
module.additional_description: easymarketing is the exclusive Google SMB Premium Partner in the UK easymarketing’s technology manages your Google Shopping campaign to maximise both impact & sales We take the worry out of online marketing saving YOU time & money   Get YOUR ad campaigns onlineConnecting to your Web-shopManaging your Data FeedCreating your CampaignsUploading onto Google & facebook  Maximise YOUR sales & minimise YOUR customer acquisition cost Not only does easymarketing’s state of the art technology offer a 38% lower customer acquisition cost* right from the start, - it is also recommended & fully supported by Google with the highest certification levelManaging your marketing campaignsOptimising CPC biddingOptimising to impact sales - constantly

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders.
module.additional_description: Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically. Free 30-day trial! : Immediately after the notification and shop-registration, you will receive your personal unique activation key (pass phrase). With this key you can activate and use the software to it's full extent. No additional or further costs are incurred during the 30 days test period
module.additional_description: Sell more than ever :78% of all online-buyer-decisions are made on marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount These are the most important distribution channels to increase your sales dramatically. Use your Prestashop in combination with the magnalister addon and make your store a distribution, inventory- and order-management-system.

module.name: payolution
module.description: Since 2011 payolution offers innovative solutions for invoicing and installments in the entire DACH region
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Since 2011 payolution offers innovative solutions for invoicing and installments in the entire DACH region. As a white label provider we operate in the background what enables the merchant to strengthen the trust between himself and his customers.
module.additional_description: 1. Increased sales and revenue 2. Higher conversion rate 3. More returning customers 4. 100% risk free & guarateed payout

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do.
module.additional_description: Answer visitors' questions instantlyimprove customer relationsIncrease conversion rate (impact of Smartsupp on conversion rate is measurable in Google Analytics)Understand behavior of your customers

module.name: amzpayments
module.description: Amazon Pay makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Amazon Pay makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts. Amazon Pay can help merchants add new customers, increase sales and turn casual browsers into buyers. It’s fast, easy and trusted — leverage the Amazon brand to grow your business. If you are based in the UK please use this link here to register to Amazon Pay If you are based in the USA please use this link here to register to Amazon Pay
module.additional_description: Make it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay in your Prestashop shop, using the addresses and payment information stored in their Amazon accounts. It's fast, simple and secure.

module.name: heidelpay
module.description: With the heidelpay-module you are able to accept transactions worldwide. These payment methods are available for E-COM, M-COM and the POS
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With the heidelpay-module you are able to accept transactions worldwide. These payment methods are available for E-COM, M-COM and the POS.
module.additional_description: Because of its lean and frictionless checkout processes the module gives an absolute secure feeling to your customers while the payment process and reduces this way purchase demolitions and increases your conversion rates.With the heidelpay-module you are able to:offer all payment methods with only one single partnerachieve new target groupsachieve more customers altogetherincrease your revenue, by offering always the right payment method The module supports the following payment methods:Credit CardsDebit CardsDirect DebitInvoice (with service of transaction guarantee)PayPalSofortüberweisungiDealmore payment options available on requestPlease find more Information and detailed instructions for registration here

module.name: lowcostexpress
module.description: Shipping module giving access to the full catalog of services from MYFLYINGBOX
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Shipping module giving access to the full catalog of services from MYFLYINGBOX. Negotiated rates with major domestic carriers and international groups (UPS, Fedex, TNT, DHL), depending on your country.
module.additional_description: Full catalog of services from MY FLYING BOX, regardless of the geographic location of the shipper. Both domestic (Chronopost, Bpost, USPS, Zeleris, Bartolini, PostNL...) and international carriers (UPS, Fedex, TNT et DHL). No minimum volume required. Negotiated rates from France, Belgium, Netherlands, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom, USA, Spain and China. Payment deadline 30 days after invoicing. Invoicing at the end of the month. Only for businesses.

module.name: pilipay
module.displayName: 1-Click sell to China - PILIBABA all-in-one checkout
module.description: Pilibaba Extension provides major China Payment gateways(including AliPay, UnionPay , WeChatPay and 50+banks cards) and cheaper & effective logistics service for you sell to China as easy as 1-2-3
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Pilibaba Extension provides major China Payment gateways(including AliPay, UnionPay , WeChatPay and 50+banks cards) and cheaper & effective logistics service for you sell to China as easy as 1-2-3 !
module.additional_description: Under Pilibaba's support, your website will obtain below features : 1. Get integration with PiliPay supported by UnionPay / AliPay / WechatPay to cover all user demands.2. Get clear guaranteed landed price checkout page in Chinese.3. Get Customs Compliance with all orders to avoid being returned.4. Get free marketing support -traffic generation in China market, 20 free publishing channels to greatly improve your brand recognition including frequently exposued products on our marketpalce http://www.pilibaba.com/cnTotally free work of translation and uploading.5. Get products descriptions in Chinese and localized introduction page of your products to raise conversion.6. Get domestic logistics support -shipping to a Pilibaba designated domestic warehouse all over the world with efficient re-label. Pilibaba handles customs clearance and door-to-door delivery anywhere in China professionally and efficiently.7. Get free mandarin after-sale and pre-sale service team to guarantee 100% customer satisfaction. Pre-installed in Prestashop, activate Pilibaba module within 1 minute and you are able to accept orders from 1.3 Billion Chinese customers immediately !

module.name: selldorado
module.displayName: Selldorado : your online ads quickly & easily !
module.description: Selldorado’s module installs automatically on your e-commerce shop the technical elements required to launch campaigns on Selldorado
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Selldorado’s module installs automatically on your e-commerce shop the technical elements required to launch campaigns on Selldorado. So, you can directly launch your advertising campaigns on Selldorado without technical intervention.
module.additional_description: Save time : Selldorado proposes package deals for your needs and can be activated immediatelyA qualified traffic : with few clicks, access to a powerful and recognised partner network that broadcast your ads (iGraal , ma-reduc.com , Google, Ebuyclub ... )Simplicity : a single tool to manage your online advertising campaignsFast : quick activation and intuitive to use, even for novicesNo subscription required and no fixed fees, you only pay commission on sales provided by the partnersAdvertising medium hosting includedAccess to help documentation and our community to develop your knowledge in the e-commerce field

module.name: pudo
module.description: This module allow your customers to pick up their purchases at one intelligent locker at a  time and place that's convenient for them
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This module allow your customers to pick up their purchases at one intelligent locker at a  time and place that's convenient for them.
module.additional_description: With near to 1000 pickup points in Spain,  avoiding the inconvenience of missed deliveries, It  offers ease of access to your packages and extended hours for pickup.  Easy installation.Minimum configuration required.  Save time with simplified management. The module is very simple to install and use  and does not require fine­tuning of any settings or preferences.  Technical support to help you in case of problems. But we do not provide assistance  with issues related to the server, or the installation of prestashop or incompatibility  with other modules.

module.name: steerfox
module.description: Increase the ROI of your multi-source campaigns. Use our automated bid manager and stay focused on your traffice acquisition strategy
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase the ROI of your multi-source campaigns. Use our automated bid manager and stay focused on your traffice acquisition strategy.
module.additional_description: The only module protecting your product feed from the eyes of your competitors : Steerfox is the only web solution securising the transfer of your product feed between your website and Google. Generate traffic from your product catalog Choose your budget depending on the desired traffic to your or your shops. No commitment is required. Our robots boost sales of your e-commerce site. SteerFox:recognizes your products,Complete information,optimize their presence on all channels, article by article.Increase productivity Generate campaigns automatically from your product catalog. Our robots analyze it -as well as your competition- to create the best advertising campaigns in suitable formats: text ads or banners. Steerfox outperform digital agencies through its robots that generate significant savings in terms of time and campaign management cost. Manage multiple sources intelligently Our buying traffic tool connects to multiple audiences (Google Adwords, Google Shopping, Bing Ads, Amazon, Facebook Product Ads, Criteo ...). It creates, manages and optimizes your campaigns in relation with the back office suppliers. SteerFox provides a report of the consolidated results on a single page. Increase your traffic from 60 to 120% Increase the ROI of your campaigns from 30 to 60% Get almost immediate results

module.name: cubyn
module.description: Cubyn is a on demand logistic solution for businesses in France.We are collecting your products, packing them and transferring them to a courrier for 1€
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Cubyn is a on demand logistic solution for businesses in France.We are collecting your products, packing them and transferring them to a courrier for 1€. — Please select the French language to have details.
module.additional_description: Send more and pay less your shipments from France — Please select the French language to have details.

module.name: ebadgeletitbuy
module.description: A pledge of confidence for your customers Let it buy certifies the existence of your company by an e-badge. Your customers can view information regarding your business transparently
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A pledge of confidence for your customers Let it buy certifies the existence of your company by an e-badge. Your customers can view information regarding your business transparently. Join the companies, reassure your customers and expand your sales.
module.additional_description: The increase of fraud on the net makes visitors want to establish a trusting relationship with a company before buying. For online retailers, this e-badge allows them to be completely transparent to their customers. The e-badge is the proof that the company behind the e-commerce website exists. A customer who is convinced of the existence of a company, whose products or services interests him, is a client who buys and who is more likely loyal. A service offered by Altares Data mining is the core business of Altares. For over 170 years, our company has become an independent trusted third party, being completely neutral. At Altares, our belief is that controlling your data should be your client’s and your business' service. It allows you to get a decisive competitive advantage. How? Seamlessly with the Let It Buy e-badge.

module.name: etranslation
module.description: 9 out of 10 internet users prefer browsing sites in their native language
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: 9 out of 10 internet users prefer browsing sites in their native language. Don't miss the Cross-Border train! Invest in an optimised translation  and make the most of our native translators and automatic content export and translation import tools
module.additional_description: Translation by qualified, native translators who are e-commerce specialistsA made-to-measure, personalised service. We are not a translation platform                                                                                                                               The most reasonable rates, thanks to our free repetition policy (an average of 20 to 35% of an e-commerce site is repeated)Automated content export and translation import

module.name: onehopsmsservice
module.description: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop. Whether it's sending auto confirmation messages or keeping your customers posted on the delivery status, Onehop can help you improve your Customer Interaction using SMS. Experience the magic of SMS!
module.additional_description: Feature Benefits: Merchants can easily interact with their customers via SMS. Merchants can send automated SMS alerts and notifications to their customers for: Order confirmation when an order is placed.Shipment confirmation when a product is shipped.Delivery confirmation when a product is delivered to the customer.Out of stock alerts for merchants to receive an update when a product is out of stock.Back in stock alerts for the customers when merchants update their stocks. Commercial Benefits: Discounts on purchase of a large volume of SMS credits* Service Benefits: Premium and instant support over Email, Call, Live Chat and Facebook. Free, on-call assistance with onboarding.

module.name: eo_wing
module.description: At Wing, we pick up all your products, professionnaly pack them and ship them using the lowest rate !
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At Wing, we pick up all your products, professionnaly pack them and ship them using the lowest rate !
module.additional_description: - TIME : Don't waste one more minute on packaging or dropping your products at the post office. - SAVINGS : Save money thanks to the low rates we have negotiated for you among major carriers - QUALITY : Get your shipments packed by trained experts using high-quality materials- SIMPLE : Directly integrated with your store you can focus on what you send, not how- CUSTOMIZATION : Stickers, goodies, inserts, large or irregular items ? No worries, we will shape your ideas- TRACKING : Track all your packages and easily notify your customers in real time

module.name: easywebtoapp
module.description: Create Amazing Mobile Apps for Google Play & iTunes that combine your responsive PrestaShop web store with powerful AppNotch native app features
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Create Amazing Mobile Apps for Google Play & iTunes that combine your responsive PrestaShop web store with powerful AppNotch native app features.
module.additional_description: As a PrestaShop store developer, you'll now be able to create powerful mobile apps to help your clients:      * Put Your Store on Your Customer's Phone* Make it Easy to do Business.* Be One Tap Away to Order* Keep Their People Engaged.* Get More Repeat Business.* Increase Your Site's SEO Ranking* Increase Repeat Orders with Your Store App* Boost Your Brand - Be in Google Play and iTunes.* Send Effective Push Notifications for Specials   What's great is you can help your clients grow their business while earning extra income on the exceptional work you already did. You already built a beautiful mobile friendly website for your client that gives their users a usable mobile experience. But, customers now want and expect easy, simple engagement. They want to go to their phone and tap an app icon not type a long website address to go where they want to go. They want to get timely alerts or receive push notifications letting them know of a great deal available to them. With Google now linking websites to mobile apps, you can also give your clients the easiest and most cost-effective way to boost to their SEO ranking.  Here's how it works:  * Simply drop your mobile friendly website URL into the AppNotch app.* The result is an amazing app with your all the design and functionality of your website as the UI plus a powerful app menu with app features like push notifications, message log, camera, cash register and more.* AppNotch publishes your app in the Google Play or iTunes public app stores for you or you can publish yourself using your certificates.* Your app is synchronized with your website. Anytime you update your website or app menu, your mobile app will be updated in real time with no need to republish to the app stores.* You can try your app for FREE. Preview your app on your phone by simply dropping in your URL into AppNotch and we will send you the link to Preview your app by text or email   Support -  https://addons.prestashop.com/en/contact-us?id_product=23574   Please Vote and EnjoyYour votes really make a difference! Thanks

module.name: googleshopping
module.description: Google Shopping helps businesses like you tap into the power of customer intent to reach the right people with relevant products ads, when it matters the most
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Google Shopping helps businesses like you tap into the power of customer intent to reach the right people with relevant products ads, when it matters the most.  With Google Shopping, increase your sales by at least 30% !
module.additional_description: With Google Shopping, put your product images, price, and business name right in front of people searching on Google, no matter what device they're using. Benefits:Increase visits to your shop being displayed among the 100 billions monthly Google searches Minimize workload and go-to-market time: Use the product information you already have in PrestaShop without needing to create separate files to submit to GoogleData accuracy: Continuously import fresh data from your store on PrestaShop without any additional workImprove conversion rate thanks to qualified Google trafic as well as your ranking in the search engine

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Translate your PrestaShop store in minutes, no coding required, just use our user-friendly, visual editor. Choose from machine-translation, manual translation (do it yourself) or order professional human translation with just a click!
module.additional_description: Reach new customers globally in a matter of minutes & increase salesManually edit translations, replace images, fix style issues with just a click in our visual editorImmediately compete with the big guys using your fully localized PrestaShop store

module.name: chargeback
module.description: Chargeback prevents and recovers revenue lost to fraud by intercepting orders confirmed fraudulent by issuing banks and quickly and comprehensively responding to disputes with the proper evidence requ
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Chargeback prevents and recovers revenue lost to fraud by intercepting orders confirmed fraudulent by issuing banks and quickly and comprehensively responding to disputes with the proper evidence required to reverse chargebacks.
module.additional_description: Chargeback gives you control and insights into customer disputes and fraud management. With this module, you protect your business’ profitability through: Order cancellations and shipment blocking for goods purchased with stolen credit cards.Recovering revenue lost to the fraudulent and accidental use of chargeback rights by your legitimate customers.Providing reporting and analytics to prevent fraud and improve overall operations. Issuer confirmed fraud and dispute Alerts provide critical time needed to cancel orders, stop shipments and deactivate gift cards as well as protect against a high chargeback ratio. When issuers notify us of impending chargebacks before it hits the card network (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), we can process a refund, cancel orders, reroute shipments, and deactivate gift cards to effectively end the dispute before it becomes a chargeback. How Chargeback Alerts work:Participating issuers have fraud engines that notify Chargeback of confirmed fraud and newly-initiated customer disputes.After notification, a merchant has 24 to 72 hours to respond.Depending on your business rules, the customer is refunded, order is cancelled, shipment is rerouted, or gift card is cancelled.The customer dispute is stopped before the issuer notifies the card network and it becomes a chargeback. Automated Responses use your PrestaShop order information to quickly craft comprehensive and compelling chargeback responses for your merchant account processor and acquiring bank. Chargeback will pull all of the data it needs for each dispute you receive and submit the response to your merchant account processor. How Chargeback Responses work:Your processor is monitored for new chargebacks.Compelling evidence is pulled from all data sources and used to generate a comprehensive chargeback response.Lost revenue is recovered.

module.name: wirecardceecheckoutseamless
module.description: Integration of all popular payment methods seamlessly and PCI DSS compliant into your online shop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integration of all popular payment methods seamlessly and PCI DSS compliant into your online shop.
module.additional_description: Wirecard Checkout Seamless supports all popular payment methods (credit cards, SEPA Direct Debit, invoice, etc.) - on any consumer device fulfilling PCI DSS compliance. The interface is integrated seamlessly into the online shop and allows for a customized configuration of the payment process (cross-selling and up-selling). Customer service is available quickly via live chat or a service hotline.

module.name: digitaleo
module.description: Directly incorporated into the Prestashop back office, you can easily synchronise your contacts and create all your emails, newsletters, and SMS to communicate more efficiently with your clients
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Directly incorporated into the Prestashop back office, you can easily synchronise your contacts and create all your emails, newsletters, and SMS to communicate more efficiently with your clients. Test it and enjoy 10 000 emails and 100 free SMS!
module.additional_description: Thanks to Digitaleo: - Save time thanks to the contact synchronization between Prestashop and Digitaleo- Segment your contacts and easily create lists to communicate in a more focused and relevant way- Send high quality and responsive emails thanks to the huge variety of templates one can customize- Increase your customer loyalty by sending them personalized messages- Generate more traffic to your website by informing your current and potential clients about promotions or new products- Simplify your tasks by programming the date and time you want to send in your emails- Optimise your marketing campaigns by accessing your detailed statistics- Ensuring an optimised deliver ratio in your emails and SMS- Enjoy a technical support expert in your activity sector

module.name: stripe_official
module.description: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments.​Install Stripe's plugin on your PrestaShop online store, create a Stripe account, and start accepting payments immediately.
module.additional_description: Create your Stripe account in 10 minutes and immediately start accepting payments via Visa, MasterCard and American Express (no additional contract/merchant ID needed from your bank)Improve your conversion rate by offering a seamless payment experience to your customers: Stripe lets you host the payment form on your own pages, without redirection to a bank third-part pageKeep your fraud under control thanks to customizable 3D-Secure and Stripe Radar, our suite of anti-fraud toolsHundreds of third-part integrations to enrich your Stripe set-up (invoicing, SMS...) This plugin fully relies on Stripe.js to generate a token that gets used to create the charge with Stripe: sensitive data will never hit your servers, maintaining a high level of security and preventing you from a heavy PCI/DSS certification.

module.name: salesmanago
module.description: #1 Marketing Automation Platform for eCommerce used by over 6k companies. Test it for free with professional support
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: #1 Marketing Automation Platform for eCommerce used by over 6k companies. Test it for free with professional support.
module.additional_description: SALESmanago Marketing Automation for eCommerce What SALESmanago offers for your online store? Converts page views to real customers, monitor what they are doing on your web shop.Automatically does a segmentation based on web shop behaviourCreates & sends personalized content without manual workCreates your own sales chat using bots SALESmanago is a cloud-based online Marketing Automation platform used by over 6,000 companies all over the world, mostly B2C and Online Stores. Using the power of real-time website and mobile application behavior analysis, SALESmanago enables clients to fully personalize email marketing, dynamic website content, social media and mobile marketing. - Licence starts at 199$ per month with on-boarding support included. - Unlimited email campaigns and messages sent - No limits for users and marketing automation actions - One month notice, no risk for your business, you pay if system starts working for you. - Free Customer Training Webinars.

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store&rsq
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store’s back office! This free module allows you to easily modify the template of your transactional emails, such as the registration confirmation or order confirmation, without hiring a designer.
module.additional_description: This email template installation and management module allows you to interchange and modify your different templates and save your configurations. Depending on the design and level of customization that the developer has allowed, your templates can be customized and allow you to:   modify the emails’ main and secondary colorschoose the text's fontadd links to your social networks and modify their logosinsert images and additional text This tool also allows you to save your transactional emails and the default PrestaShop design. Finally, you don't have to write or translate your emails’ content: the template automatically retrieves the default translations available for the transactional email in PrestaShop!
